title: smirnoff: thin open sans
content:
I found this on a portfolio site.A very nice font used for a smirnoff's website. Can you help me to identify this? thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141107131454im_/http:/typophile.com/files/smirnoff_6685.jpg)
author: slokai

comments.content: ' [Van Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20141107131454/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/rsantos/van-condensed/)'_, by fellow Typophile Ricardo Santos,_ ' [Hermes](http://web.archive.org/web/20141107131454/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Hermes)'_, by Matthew Butterick / Font Bureau, or even_ ' [Conduit](http://web.archive.org/web/20141107131454/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-conduit/)'_, by Mark van Bronkhorst, may get you slightly closer, as an alternate.._
I'd like to recover this old post to see if there's more luck, and someone can identify now the font. Thank you!
